en: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
The Day they are dragged into the Fire
The Day they are dragged into the Fire
on their faces [it will be said],
Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

ar: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
en: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
And We have already destroyed your kinds,
so is there any who will remember?
And everything they did is in written records.
And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens
Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

ar: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
en: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
